name: Gravity Rush 2
notes: The game is still playable offline, but there are several features of the online game that are missing, the biggest being Treasure Hunts a mini game where you take a photo of a treasure chest, and then that photo is then picked up by other players and they can use the photo to find the treasure. With the servers offline, many of the items offered by using the online mode are no longer available.
description: Gravity Rush follows Kat a girl who gains the mysterious power to change the direction of gravity. After the events of the first game the city of Hekseville is rebuilding when a gravitational event is detected in Neu Hiraleon, a floating island district of Hekseville. Kat along with her friend Raven and Syd go and investigate, the disturbance causes a rift and pulls all 3 into a different world along with the whole district.
